ygData.msgSnippet: ... wide. ... would ... I think they split up Selo s and Clouding on purpose.  I seem to recall GZ stating that Solon s was intentionally coded so that singing
ygData.messageBody:
> > Sub 50 ideas:
> > Selo's Shooting Star (39th?)
> > Percussion - outdoor only
> > Combination of Selo's Accelerando, Shauri's Sonorous Clouding, and
> > Agilmente's Aria of Eagles + Ultravision. Party effect, Range: Zone
wide.
>
> Uhhhh... do you honestly think they'll allow this?
>
>
> Why not? I can weave Selo's and Aria now. Why not throw in a song that
would
> just be plain fun and make group travel much easier?

I think they split up Selo's and Clouding on purpose. I seem to recall GZ
stating that Solon's was intentionally coded so that singing another song
with it would interrupt it. Then again maybe they'll let up on that since
this _is_ an over-50 song. I like the idea but I doubt they'll let us have
a song that is _THAT_ useful. ;)

>
> > A new charm song, if not full charm then atleast a charm animal song
(make
> > this one 44th or 49th)
>
> Charm animal is utterly useless (and pointless) for a bard. 90% of the
> zones we go to do not have animals high enough to bother with. Remember
> that our charm is already limited by the fact that we have to re-charm
every
> 10-15 seconds. This would be better as our 39th song as well since we
> "lose" our charm at 37.
>
>
> Charm animal useless? Talk to the druids in Sol B that charm sonic bats
all
> night long.....
> Also the expansion is going to have high level outdoor zones. I am sure
> there will be some 50+ animals to play with.
>

That's 1 dungeon. Sure there will be other zones. But I'd rather not give
Verant the idea to give us _just_ charm animal. We _deserve_ an upgrade to
our current _unrestricted_ charm. Why accept something less? If you think
about it there are FAR more places _without_ lvl 37+ animals than places
with them. I'd rather not have yet another song that I will rarely use when
I already have one that's better :(

> > Niv's Chrorus of Restoration
> > String Required
> > 2xHymn of Restoration + Fatigue restoral + 1.5xCassindra's Chorus of
> > Clarity.
> > Fully stacks with Hymn of Restoration, Cassindra's Chorus of Clarity,
> Niv's
> > Melody of Preservation.
>
> Interesting but I think this would be far too powerful. twice hymn + jig
+
> clarity? uhh.... and stackable?
>
> hymn x 2 at 50th would = 35 a tick healing. Not really that overpowered,
> imo.
>
Uhh
Nivs = 15hp / tic. Hymn = 17hp/tic this=35hp/tic
Total= roughly 70hp/tic
I seriously doubt Verant will go for something like this that, on top of all
that, throws on Clarity, a spell shield, and whatever else nivs does.
